Model: U12H064 :Per the manual, the default SSID is '''NETGEAR'''. ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/netgear/wgr614v7 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=25568&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=60 Internal pictures on the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.badcaps.net/forum/showthread.php?t=23033 On the badcaps.net forum] (images) *[http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=netgear_wgr614&num=1 ''Review'' on '''Phoronix'''] Flash part sourced from [http://www.myopenrouter.com/forum/thread/10511/Open-firmware-on-WGR614-v7/ this myopenrouter post] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} :- Operation System: VxWorks 5.4.2 :- Bootloader do not working as tftp client (even if this option is available) :- Login to VxWorks over serial do not working with default logina name :- Processord ID: 00019064 (Processor ID: 0x90 ([[MIPS 4KEc]] r2); : . Maj.Rev: 0x3; Min. Rev: 0x1) ===Telnet=== By default telnet refuse all logins. Special magic packet should be send first :to enable telnet. See [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/telnet.console Unlocking the Netgear Telnet Console] for more details. ====Super user credentials==== You need this to login over '''serial port''' or '''telnet''' {| class="wikitable" |+ |- ! Username ! Password |- | Gearguy | Geardog |} ====Firmware header====
